name: dep-pulse
description: Real-time health and dependency analysis for your projects

depPulse.vulnerabilityDetection.primaryS.description: Select Vulnerability Source. OSV.dev is free and has no rate limits. GitHub requires a token.

depPulse.analysis.autoScanOnStartup.description: Automatically scan dependencies when workspace opens

depPulse.analysis.enableCache.description: Enable caching of analysis results to speed up subsequent scans

depPulse.analysis.strategy.description: Select the scanning strategy. 'auto' tries to use package manager CLI (npm/pnpm/yarn) for best accuracy and falls back to static parsing. 'native' forces CLI usage. 'static' forces file parsing.

depPulse.analysis.includeTransitiveDepen.description: Include transitive dependencies in analysis and dashboard. When disabled, DepPulse only analyzes direct dependencies and hides transitive-related insights.

depPulse.analysis.scanOnSave.description: Automatically scan when dependency files are saved

depPulse.healthScore.weights.security.description: Weight for security in health score calculation (0-1)

depPulse.healthScore.weights.freshness.description: Weight for freshness in health score calculation (0-1)

depPulse.healthScore.weights.compatibili.description: Weight for compatibility in health score calculation (0-1)

depPulse.healthScore.weights.license.description: Weight for license compliance in health score calculation (0-1)

depPulse.licenses.acceptableLicenses.description: List of acceptable SPDX license identifiers. Dependencies with licenses not in this list will be marked as incompatible. See https://spdx.org/licenses/ for valid identifiers.

depPulse.licenses.strictMode.description: If true, only permissive licenses are acceptable. If false, common copyleft licenses (LGPL, MPL) may also be acceptable based on your acceptableLicenses list.

depPulse.licenses.projectLicense.description: Your project's license (SPDX identifier). Used to check compatibility with dependencies. If not set, will attempt to read from package.json.

depPulse.api.openRouterModel.description: Model for OpenRouter alternatives (key is managed via DepPulse: Configure API Secrets)

depPulse.api.openaiModel.description: Model for OpenAI alternatives (key is managed via DepPulse: Configure API Secrets)

depPulse.api.geminiModel.description: Model for Gemini alternatives (key is managed via DepPulse: Configure API Secrets)

depPulse.cache.vulnerabilityTTLMinutes.description: Cache TTL for vulnerability data (all sources) in minutes

depPulse.cache.bypassCacheForCritical.description: Bypass cache for critical and high severity vulnerabilities

depPulse.freshness.unmaintainedThreshold.description: Number of days without updates before a package is considered unmaintained (default: 730 days / 2 years)

depPulse.freshness.majorVersionGracePeri.description: Grace period in days before marking a package as outdated due to major version update (default: 90 days)

depPulse.analysis.chunkSize.description: Number of dependencies to process in each chunk for large projects. Smaller chunks use less memory but may be slower. Default: 50

scripts.vscode:prepublish: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run copy:assets && pnpm run esbuild:production
scripts.validate: pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run type-check
